src_text: lokhu kungarhagalisa ubujamo esele buqokeme ngelizweni kulimaze nemizamo yelizweloke.
tgt_text: kuyacaca ukuthi leli igciwane elihlasela abantu balolonke uhlanga.

src_text: singakhethululi abantu bamanye amazwe besiphelelane ihliziyo lokha omunye nakanombono ophikisanako ovezwa ngamanye amazwe kuzakhamuzi ezivela lapho kuwe khona umulwana wecorona kokuthoma neendaweni ezisekabeni yeyurophu.
tgt_text: ake sehlise uzwelo kulabo abathelelekile, nalabo abasanda kubuya ekhaya bebuya emazweni esiwathatha njengayingozi kakhulu.

src_text: lo mumulwana ongena abantu bazo zoke iintjhaba.
tgt_text: asisize labo abadinga usizo nalabo ababuthaka, kunokuthi sibaxwaye.

src_text: asehlisele izwelo lethu kilabo abatshwayelekileko nakilabo ababuyele ngelizweni lekhethu babuya emazweni anobungozi bobulwelobu.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka sithembeke ezimfundisweni zokubekezelelana nokuhlonipha ezichaza thina njengabantu.

src_text: asisize labo abatlhogako nabanganabuyo, kunokubanina.
tgt_text: egameni labo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngibonga iqembu ebelilande abantu bakithi ewuhan, echina, kanjalo nobuholi kanye nabantu baselimpopo abasiza ngohlelo lendawo yokuhlalisa ngabodwana labo abathelelekile.

src_text: sizokuhlala sibambelele efundisweni yokubekezelelana nehlonipho ekumatshwayo asihlathululako njengabantu.
tgt_text: lesi isikhathi esinzima.

src_text: egameni labantu boke besewula afrika ngithokoza isiqhema esibuyise izakhamuzi zekhethu ukusuka ewuhan, echina, kunye noburholi nabantu belimpopo abasizako ngehlelo lokufukanyiswakulatjhwa.
tgt_text: futhi ezikhathini zobunzima lapho kwambulwa khona amandla ethu.

src_text: lesi kusikhathi esibudisi.
tgt_text: sizosukumela phezulu sithathe izinqumo, ngokuzimisela nokuba nenhloso.

src_text: kanti kungeenkhathi ezibudisi lezi lapho amandlethu avela khona.
tgt_text: sizosebenza ngokubambisana, ngoba ukuphumelela kwemizamo yethu kuncike ekusebenzeni kwawo wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika.

src_text: sizokuthatha amagadango aqinileko, ngokuzimisela nangomnqopho.
tgt_text: umzuzu kathuma mina ususengamele, mhlawumbe kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: sizokusebenza ngokubambisana, ngombana ipumelelo yemizamo yethu iyame kiwo woke amasewula afrika.
tgt_text: nalokhu kuzodlula.

src_text: isikhathi sethuma mina sifikile kithi, mhlamunye ukudlula ngaphambilini.
tgt_text: ngokubambisana singalwisana necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba ubhekene nomunyu wesimo esiphuthumayo sempilo yomphakathi esingakaze silinganiswe eminyakeni elikhulu.

src_text: isizo elinikelwa izakhamuzi zekhethu ezinganabuyo vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amanengi ephasini zombelele amemezele ukuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namamkhambo ngonobangela wengogwana icorona ngomnqopho wokusindisa amaphilo wezakhamuzi zawo.
tgt_text: ukusizwa kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amaningi emhlabeni asevale amazwe ngenxa yegciwane lecorona ngokomqondo wokuthi kuzosindisa izimpilo zezakhamuzi zabo.

src_text: senze njalo nathi ngelizweni lekhethu, kodwana kwethu ukuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo kuveze umlandelande wamatlhuwo emphakathini wekhethu obeka tjhatjhalazi umtlhago wokuba dududu, ukungalingani nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi, ekuyinto ehlukanisa phakathi imiphakathi yethu.
tgt_text: nathi senze okufanayo ezweni lethu, kodwa ukuvalwa kwezwe lethu kwembule iphutha elidabukisayo emphakathini wethu okubeke obala indlela ububha, ukungalingani nokuswelakala kwemisebenzi okuhlukanisa ngayo imiphakathi yethu.

src_text: abukho ubuhlungu obukhulu kunalobo bombelethi olilelwa bantwana abalambileko, kufumaniseke bona akanalitho angabapha lona.
tgt_text: alukho usizi olwedlula olomzali okhalelwa abantwana befuna ukudla, kodwa benge nalutho abangabanika lona.

src_text: abukho ubuhlungu nokungakalungi kobujamo emphakathini lapho kunabantu abazigedle ngomnono wabo, kanti ngapha abanye abanabuyo, babhodwe mtlhago bebaphila ngokudobhelela kesinye isikhathi badududu.
tgt_text: akukho ukungabi nabu lungiswa obedlula umpha kathi lapho abanye baphila ngokunethezeka nokungasweli lutho, ngesikhathi abanye bezabalazela ukuphila ngalokhu okuncane abanakho noma ngalokhu abangenakho nhlobo.

src_text: iye, le mithelela namkha mumonakalo owatjhiywa yikambiso yombuso webandlululo wesikhathi sangaphambilini owawuraga ukungalinganiswa kwamathuba womnotho anikelwa izakhamuzi.
tgt_text: yebo, lena imiphumela emibi eyasala yesikhathi esedlule ebesinokukhubazeka nokungalingani.

src_text: ngahlanye amanye matshwayo aveza ukubhalelwa kwabaphathi bethu besikhathi sombuso wentando yenengi.
tgt_text: kodwa futhi kuyizimpawu zokwehluleka kwethu emphakathini wasemva kobandlululo.

src_text: ukuqinteliswa kwemi nye imisebenzi namakhambo elizweni loke kulethwe ngehloso yokulwa nengogwana icorona eveze tjhatjhalazi imiraro ethuweleleko ekade isibhodile.
tgt_text: ukuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli ngenxa yokulwisana negciwane lecorona sekuvele kwabhebhethekisa kakhulu inkinga elokhu yabakhona.

src_text: eemvekeni ezimbalwa ezidluleko, sibone iinthombe eziyibangamatlhuwo lapha abantu abanganabuyo bebawalazela bafuna ukugama amaphasela wokudla emazikweni asabalalisa iinjumbana zokudla hlangana nalokho nemitjhagalo yemiphakathi elwela ukutlhayela kokudla.
tgt_text: emavikini ambalwa edlule, sesibhekane nezithombe eziletha usizi zabantu abahluphekile bebanga izijumbana zokudla ezikhungweni zokunikezela ngokudla kanye nemibhikisho yemiphakathi ngokuswelakala kokudla.

src_text: bekwafuneka bona siqalane godu nezwangobatjho epha zamisako nehlubayezako.
tgt_text: siphinde futhi sabhekana nezi nsolo eziphazamisayo nezihlazayo.

src_text: iimfunda ezithile zifumene imibiko ethi iimphathimandla ezimarhamaru ekusolelwa bonyana zibasebenzi bembu sweni, banekohlakalo, bazibekela iinjumbanezi nofana bazithengise ekuyinto ephambene nomthetho ngoba zenzelwe abatlhogako namkha abadobha phasi.
tgt_text: izifundazwe eziningana zithole imibiko yokuthi kunabantu abanonya, abanye babo okusolakala ukuthi izikhulu zikahulumeni, bagweve noma badayisa izijumbana zokudla ezihlinzekelwe abantu abaswele nabahluphekile, noma bakuhambisa kubangani nasemindenini yabo.

src_text: nasele kutholakele ubufakazi obuphathekako ngezwangobatjho le sizokuthathela abantwabo amagadango aqinileko.
tgt_text: uma kuke kwatholakala ukuthi lezi zinsolo ziliqiniso sizobhekana nalabo bantu ngesikhulu isihluku.

src_text: ngokumenyezelwa kobujamo behlekelele yelizweloke nokubethwa komthetho wokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo singene ebujameni esingakhange sibubone kilelizwe.
tgt_text: ngokumemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele nokubeka kokuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli besizwa amanzi ngobhoko.

src_text: akhange isewula afrika iqalane nobujamo oburhabako bezamaphilo obusezingeli elinjengaleli.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika ayikaze yabhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo esinzima kangaka ngempilo yomphakathi.

src_text: bekwafanela seqe msinyana senze imizamo yokuphulukisa amaphilo.
tgt_text: bekumele sisukume ngokushesha ukuze sisindise izimpilo.

src_text: godu kufuze samukele bonyana emalangeni neemvekeni ezilandelako, ukunikelwa kwesekelo ezakhamuzini ezinganabuyo zelizwe lekhethu kukhambe kabuthaka kunokulindelekileko, nokobana kube khona iindawana lapho iimphoso zenzeka khona.
tgt_text: kumele sikuvume ukuthi ezinsukwini nasemavikini alandelile, ukwesekwa kwezakhamuzi zakule lizwe lakithi ezikhungatheke kakhulu kuhambe kancane kunalokho obekudingeka, futhi sekuvuleke igebe.

src_text: nanyana kunjalo, ukubhadelwa kwesibonelelo sesondlo kudlule kuhle, begodu ngemva kweentjhijilo ezimbalwa zesiterhiniki, ihlelo lokusatjalaliswa kweenjumbana zokudla lizokwenziwa libe lula.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, ukukhokhwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni kuqhubeke ngaphandle kwezithiyo, futhi emva kwezingqinamba eziningana zobuchwepheshe, uhlelo lokuthunyelwa kokudla luyalungiswa.

src_text: ukubethwa komthetho wokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo elizweni loke okwamenyezelwa ngesikhathi esiﬁ tjhani kwaletha iintjhijilo ezithile.
tgt_text: ukubeka ukuvalwa kwezwe esikhathini esifushane kakhulu kulethe izinselelo eziningi.

src_text: kuﬁ ke lapho kufanele bona isizwe silinganise amagadango esiwathathako ngokukhambelana nokuthobela imilayelo yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi nama khambo.
tgt_text: bekumele siqhathanise ubungako bokuvalwa kwezwe nobukhulu bemikhawulo okuzomelwe ibekwe.

src_text: sakhetha ukuthatha amagadango abonakala ayiphoso kodwana angehlangothini lokuphulukisa izakhamuzi ekufeni.
tgt_text: sikhethe ukuba sohlangothini lokuqaphela.

src_text: njengokuvezwe mbiko womnyano wezamaphilo wamhlapha, oveze bona ukuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo ngesikhathi okwenziwa ngaso kurhobhise izinga lokuthelelana begodu ngokuqakathekileko, kwasinikela isikhathi sokulungiselela ikghonakalo yokurhatjheka kokuthelelana eemvekeni neenyangeni ezizako.
tgt_text: futhi ngokombiko owethulwa ngungqongqoshe wezempilo kungekudala, ukuvalwa kwezwe ngesikhathi esakwenza ngaso kwehlise izinga lokusuleleka, futhi okubaluleke kakhulu, kusinikeze isikhathi sokulungiselela ukubhebhetheka okukhulu ekusulelekeni okungenzeka emavikini nezinyanga ezizayo.

src_text: bekwafanela bona sitjheje umthelela phezu komnotho osele ubogaboga esikhathini esifitjhani nesizako, nomthelela wokuphazamiseka lokhu okukhulu emaphilweni wabantu abaziingidigidi.
tgt_text: bekumele sicabangele nomthelela emnothweni osuvele untengantenga esikhathini eside nesifushane, nomthelela walokhu kuphazamiseka okukhulu ezimpilweni zezigidi zabantu.

src_text: kwafanela bona sitjheje nomonakalo omphumela weemveke zokuzivalela emakhaya kilabo abasebenzako kodwana bangafumani umrholo wabo njalonjalo, kilabo abangasebenziko nalabo abafuna umsebenzi, labo ababambe amatorho nabasebenza ngeenkhathi ezithile zomnyaka, abadobha phasi nabanganabuyo.
tgt_text: bekumele sicabange ukuthi ukuvaleleka emakhaya amaviki kuzosho ukuthini kubantu abasebenzayo abangezukukhokhelwa amaholo ajwayelekile, kubantu abangasebenzi nakulabo abasafuna umsebenzi, kulabo abatohozayo, kulabo abathengisa emgwaqeni, kulabo abaphofu nalabo ababuthaka.

src_text: ikhabinethi izokuthatha isiqunto ngamagadango wokujamelana nomthelela wokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo emaphilweni wabantu bekhethu.
tgt_text: ikhabhinethi izoqedela iqoqo lamaqhingasu azosetshenziswa ukubhekana nomthelela wokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu bakithi.

src_text: lokhu kwandulelwe mikhulumiswano nababambisani abafaka hlangana amabhizinisi, iinhlangano zabasebenzi, iinhlangano zezekolo, iinhlangano zomphakathi kunye nomkhandlu oluleka umengameli ngezomnotho.
tgt_text: lokhu kwandulelwe imihlangano ehlukahlukene nalabo abathintekayo kubandakanya amabhizinisi, abasebenzi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, umphakathi kanye nomkhandlu oyala umongameli kwezomnotho.

src_text: abatjhebisani bezehlalakuhle balethe iintjhukumiso zokungenelela ezingaba yipengu kilabo abadobha phasi, inengi labo abathembele esizweni lezehlalakuhle bonyana baphile.
tgt_text: esisebenzisana nabo empha kathini sebelethe izicelo eziningana zokungenelela ezi ngasiza ebuthakathakeni kwalabo abadla imbuya ngothi, iningi labo abaphila ngokusizwa ngumphakathi.

src_text: sizokungezelela iimbonelelo zezehlalakuhle ngesikhathesi secovid19 ngomnqopho wokusiza amakhaya wabantu abadobha phasi.
tgt_text: sizokhuphula izinga lokuhlinzeka ngezenhlalonhle ngalesi sikhathi ukuze sisize amakhaya aphila ngaphansi kwesimo sobubha.

src_text: nangemva kokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhabo kwelizweloke, umthelela obumbi wecovid19 uzokuhlala ukhona isikhathi eside.
tgt_text: noma sekuphelile ukuvalwa kwezwe, umonakalo wako uzoqhubeka uzwakale kwabanye ngesikhathi esithile esizayo.

src_text: labo abanetjhudu lomrholo ongena njalo njalo bazokukghona ukubuyela emisebenzinabo; kodwana eengidigidini zabanye lokhu kuzokuba kulahle kelwa enyangeni lapho ngabe bafumene amatorho, benza umsebenzi emkhakheni ongakahleleki nofana bonga imali abayifumeneko bayongela ukutjheja iindingo zemindenabo.
tgt_text: labo abanenhlanhla yokuba nemiholo engathikamezeki bazokwazi ukubuyela emisebenzini yabo; kodwa izigidi zabanye abantu bazolahlekelwa inyanga lapho bebengabe bethole umsebenzi wesikhashana, ngabe bazenzele amabhizinisi ngokuthengisa emgwaqeni noma bonge imali ababeyitholile ukuze bahlangabezane nezibophezelo zemindeni yabo.

src_text: ukusekela ngokudla ligadango lesikhatjhahana lobujamo oburhabako.
tgt_text: ukusekwa ngokudla kuyindlela yesikhashana yokubhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo.

src_text: kuzokudingeka kukhambisane nepengu yasa futhi ezokusiza izakhamuzi zekhethu ezinganabuyo ukwenzelela bona ziphundlukele ngale kobudisi obusezako.
tgt_text: kuzomele kuhambisane nezisombululo ezimile ezisiza izakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka kakhulu ukunqoba izikhathi ezinzima eziseza.

src_text: ngithanda ukuthokoza amango amanengi, iinhlangano zezekolo nezakhamuzi ngokunabileko abanikela ngemali nabanikele ngezandla ukusiza kilelijima lokupha abalambileko nabanganabuyo ukudla.
tgt_text: ngiﬁ sa ukubonga izinhlangano ezizimele (ngos) eziningi, amaqembu ezenkolo kanye nezakhamuzi zakithi ezinikele imali nokuvolontiya ukusiza ngokudla kwabalambile nabaphofu.

src_text: ukuphelisa indlala akusiso isenzo somrhawu.
tgt_text: ukuqeda indlala akusona isenzo sokupha.

src_text: kuligadango elifaneleko lananyana ngiwuphi umphakathi owakhelwe phezu kwehlonipho namalungelo wabantu.
tgt_text: kubalulekile kunoma umuphi umphakathi ophila ngokuhlonipha amalungelo abantu.

src_text: kilesisigaba sepi yethu nehlekelele kukulapho nange singaliselela izinto singazifumana sisengozi.
tgt_text: sisesikhathini empini yethu nalolu bhubhane lapho ukuthatha izinto kalula kungaba yingozi enkulu.

src_text: ngikhombela omunye nomunye ayelele, arage nokuthobela imithetholawulo aphephe bekaphephise nabanye.
tgt_text: nginxenxa omunye nomunye wenu ahlale eqaphele, aqhubeke nokulandela imithethonqubo, nokuzigcina uphephile nokuphephisa abanye.

src_text: singurhulumende sizokunikela ilwazi ngamagadango wokungenelela okuthe tjha esikwenzako ukuvikela izakhamuzi zekhethu ezinganabuyo ukobana ziphuluke endlaleni engahle isahlele esikhathini esizako.
tgt_text: njengohulumeni sizonikezela ngolwazi ngokungenelela okuqonde ngqo esikwenzayo ukuvikela izakhamuzi ezibuthaka kakhulu osizini lwendlala.

src_text: hlangana kobunye ubudisi obuqalene nabantu bekhethu gadesi, akungabi kuzibuza bonyana ukudla kwesikhathi esilandelako kuzokuvela nga kiliphi ihlangothi nakhona kubuya kubani.
tgt_text: ukusizwa kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amaningi emhlabeni asevale amazwe ngenxa yegciwane lecorona ngokomqondo wokuthi kuzosindisa izimpilo zezakhamuzi zabo.

src_text: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed iphasi mazombe lingaphasi kwegandelelo elingarhobhiko loku sahlelwa mbulalazwe oyingogwana icorona , ukuratjheka kwayo esele kukhambe ngebelo eliphezulu.
tgt_text: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba wonke awuphelile amandla ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , eselibhebhethe kise okomlilo wequbula.

src_text: umtjhoga wayo awukabukufumaneka.
tgt_text: umgomo walo okusamele utholakale.

src_text: ephasini mazombe, abantu abangaphezu kweengidi eziyi3.4 baqinisekiswe bona ngabathelelekileko begodu abangaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima240,000 bahlongakele ngenca yobulwelobu.
tgt_text: emhlabeni jikelele, bangaphezu kwezigidi ezi3.4 abantu ekwaziwa ukuthi basulelekile futhi bangaphezu kwezi240 000 asebeshonile.

src_text: lezi ziinkhathi ezibudisi kwamambala.
tgt_text: lezi ngempela izikhathi ezinzima.

src_text: lokha nakumenyezelwa ubujamo behlekelele elizweni loke eemvekeni ezisithandathu ezadlulako, isewula afrika gade inezehlakalo ezima61 eziqinisekisiweko zokungenwa yingogwana icorona .
tgt_text: ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke emavikini ayisithupha adlule, iningizimu afrika yayinezigameko ezingama61 kuphela eziqinisekisiwe zabasuleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: ije isibalwesi sasiphasi kangaka, izeluleko zabososayensi nokuqala indlela esele kwenzeke ngayo kamanye amazwe, kwabonakala bonyana ukurharjheka kobulwelobu kusazokubhebhedlha.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kokubuka inani eliphansi, umbono wongoti kanye nesikubone kwamanye amazwe aphesheya kubonise ukuthi ukusuleleka kusazokhuphuka ngendlela eyisimanga.

src_text: ngatjho bonyana kuzokufanela kuthathwe amagadango arhabako nakatelela ukutjhu gululwa kwesikopilo yangamalanga.
tgt_text: ngabe sengithi kuzodingeka kuthathwe izinyathelo ezinkulu futhi eziphuthumayo.

src_text: amagadango layo – afaka hlangana ukuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo kwelizweloke nokuvalwa kwemikhawulo yelizwe lekhethu – abonakele asebenza khulu ekuriyadiseni ukurhatjheka kobulwele.
tgt_text: lezo zinyathelo – okubandakanya ukuvalwa kwezwe jikelele nokuvalwa kwemingcele – okubonise ukuthi kuyasebenza ngempela ukubambezela ukubhebhetheka kwesifo.

src_text: lokhu kuphumelele ngombana inengi lamasewula afrika lithobele imilayo yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo, ukuhlala nokujama maqalanga kwabantu nokufaka amamaski wobuso.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyenzeka ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi baseningizimu afrika bayilandele imiyalelo yokuvalwa kwezwe, ukuqhelelana nabanye abantu kanye nokugqoka izifonyo zobuso.

src_text: nginethulela ingwani ngalokhu nokhunye ukuzinikela okunengi enikwenzileyo.
tgt_text: ngiyanibonga kakhulu ngalokhu nangakho konke ukuzinikela esenikwenzile.

src_text: kilelizinga lokuraga kokwanda kombulalazwe, amanye amazwe abe nenani eliphezulu labantu abatheleleke ngobulwelobu kunelelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: kulesi sigaba sokudlondlobala kobhubhane, amanye amazwe abe nenani labasulelekile eliphezulu ukwedlula thina.

src_text: njenganje – sekumalanga ama46 solo kwabikwa isehlakalo se100 sokutheleleka ngengogwana icorona – sinezehlakalo eziqinisekisiweko eziziinkulungwana ezisi6 783. iitaly, enesibalo sabantu esilingana neselizwe lekhethu, ibe nezehlakalo ezingaphezu kwee140,000 kwathi iamerikha yona yaba nezehlakalo zokungenwa yingongwana le eziqinisekisiweko ezilinganiselwa eenkulungwaneni ezimakhulu alikhomba (i700 000) elangeni lama46.
tgt_text: njengamanje – okungusuku lwama46 selokhu sabika isigameko se100 segciwane lecorona – sesinezigameko eziqinisekisiwe eziyizi6 783. izwe laseitaly, elinenani labantu elifanayo nelethu, libe nezigameko ezingaphezu kwezi140 000 kanye nemelika ibe nezigameko eziqinisekisiwe ezilinganiselwa ezi700 000 esikhathini sezinsuku ezingama46.

src_text: kodwana lokhu akutjho bonyana ingozi sele idlule.
tgt_text: kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi ubungozi sebudlulile.

src_text: asikabukufikelela pheze esitlhorini sokurhatjheka kobulwelobu ngesewula afrika.
tgt_text: asikafiki esihlokweni sokusuleleka eningizimu afrika.

src_text: yoke imifuziselo yesayensi itjengisa bonyana izinga lokuthelelana ngobulwelobu lizokuraga nokukhula ngebelo elirhabako eenyangeni ezimbalwa ezizako.
tgt_text: lonke ucwaningo lwesayensi lubonisa ukuthi izinga lokusuleleka lisazoqhubeka likhuphuke ngesivinini esikhulu ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo.

src_text: nanyana kunjalo, ibelo ingogwana le ezokurhatjheka ngalo nesibalo sabantu abazokugcina bathelelekile kuyame kilokho esikwenzako gadesi.
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, isivinini elibhebhetheka ngaso igciwane nenani labantu abasulelekayo lizolawulwa ukuthi thina senzani manje.

src_text: kungebangelo ukugedliswa kwemithetholawulo yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo kufuze kwenziwe ngeengaba nangokuyelela.
tgt_text: yingakho ukuxegiswa kokuvalwa kwezwe kudinga kwenziwe kancane kancane nangokucophelela.

src_text: kungebangeli imithetholawulo eminengi kufuze ihlale isebenza begodu kuqakatheke khulu bonyana abantu bayithobele.
tgt_text: kungalesi sizathu ukuthi imithethonqubo eminingi kumele ihlale ikhona futhi kungani kubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi abantu bayilandele.

src_text: ngiyazi bonyana kubudisi kangangani lokhu ezakhamuzini zelizwe lekhethu begodu ngiyawuzwisisa umna ko wokobana imithetholawulo le ibeka imibandela ephazamisa amalungelwabo.
tgt_text: ngiyazi ukuthi kunzima kanjani lokhu futhi ngiyakuqonda ukukhathazeka abantu bakithi abaningi abanako ngokuthi le mithethonqubo igxambukela futhi ibeka imikhawulo kumalungelo abo.

src_text: kodwana koke lokhu kwenziwa ngoba kufanele.
tgt_text: inhlosongqangi yethu ngukugcina impilo.

src_text: umnqopho wethu omkhulu kuhlenga amaphilo.
tgt_text: ukuqhelelana nabantu nokuhlanzeka kuseyizona zikhali zethu ezihamba phambili kulo mzabalazo.

src_text: ukuba maqalanga kwabantu nokulandela ukuziphatha okufaneleko kezamaphilo kusese ziindlela eziqakathekileko esimele sizilandele zokuzivikela eziphuma phambili ekujamelaneni nepi le.
tgt_text: ilokhu okulawula imithethonqubo esiyibekile esigabeni sesine sokubhekana negciwane.

src_text: lokhu kungikho okukhambisana nemithetholawulo esiyethulileko yesigaba sesine sokujamelana nobulwelobu.
tgt_text: ukucabangela kwethu kususelwa ebufakazini obuqanda ikhanda, ulwazi lwesayensi nomnotho kanye nokusebenza okuhamba phambili kwamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: ukutjheja kwethu kususelwe ebufakazini berhubhululo, imininingwana yesayensi neyezomnotho godu nekambiso yamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: ngesahlulelo sowe1995 senkantolo yomthethosisekelo eyakhipha emthethweni isigwebo sentambo, ujustice arthur chaskalson wabhala wathi: "amalungelo empilo nesithunzi yiwona abaluleke kakhulu kuwowonke amalungelo omuntu futhi angumthombo wawo wonke amalungelo omuntu.

src_text: kusahlulelo sekhotho yomthethosisekelo somnyaka we1995 esaqunta bona isigwebo sentambo sipheliswe besithathwe njengokwephulwa komthetho, ijaji elikhulu uarthur chaskalson watlola wathi: "amalungelo wokuphila nesithunzi aqakatheke khulu kunawo woke amalungelo wabantu begodu amthombo wawo woke amalungelo womuntu ngamunye.
tgt_text: ngokuzinikela kwethu emphakathini owakhiwe ngokwamukela amalungelo abantu sidingeka ukuba siwaqhakambise la malungelo amabili okudlula wonke amanye.

src_text: ngokuzibophelela kwethu emphakathini osekelwe ekuhlonipheni amalungelo wabantu silindeleke bona sithabele amalungelo amabili la ngaphezu kwawo woke amanye.
tgt_text: "le mithethonqubo esiyibekile ibekelwe phezu kwalokho kuzinikelela empilweni nesithunzi, futhi ezithethelela – kulezi zimo ezibucayi – imikhawulo yesikhashana kwamanye amalungelo, njengokuba nelungelo lokuya lapho uthanda khona nokuba nanoma ubani ofuna ukuba naye.

src_text: "imithetholawulo le esiyimemezeleko isekelwe kilesosibopho sepilo nesithunzi, okuvumelana – ebujameni obudlu lele khulu – iinqinteliso zesikhatjhana kamanye amalungelo, njengelungelo lokukhamba nokuhlanganyela.
tgt_text: ekwenzeni lokhu, iningizimu afrika ayifani namanye amazwe.

src_text: ngokwenza lokhu, isewula afrika ayikahluki kamanye amazwe amanengi.
tgt_text: inani labantu emhlabeni elilinganiselwa koyedwa kwabahlanu livalelwe ngenxa yesifo noma lisekuvalweni kwezwe, ngaleli nani elikhula ngesivinini ngenxa yokukhula kwenani labasulelekayo.

src_text: isibalo sabantu ephasini esilinganiselwa emuntwini munye kabahlanu singaphasi kokuvalelwa nofana ukuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo kwelizweloke, ngesibalwesi esikhula msinyana samagadango wokujamelana nokurhatjheka kwengogwana okukhulako.
tgt_text: lokhu kubandakanya amazwe anenani labantu elikhulu kunelethu, njengeindia enabantu abayisigidigidi esi1.5.

src_text: lokhu kufaka hlangana amazwe anesibalo sabantu esiphezulu khulu kunesethu, njengeindia enesibalo sabantu abayibhiliyoni yinye nesiquntu (i1.5 billion).
tgt_text: inqwaba yamazwe isibeke izikhathi zokubuya ekhaya njengalesi esisibekile lana.

src_text: amazwe amanengana amemezele isikhathi sokubuya emakhaya njengaleso esele sisebenza ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: imikhawulo ekuhambeni ibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src_text: imibandela yamakhambo sele isetjenziswa nakamanye amazwe anjengeunited kingdom neparis eyihlokodorobha yefrance, ukuzithabulula umzimba komphakathi kubekelwa amaawara athileko begodu nebanga elithileko ukusuka ekhaya lomuntu ozibandulako.
tgt_text: euk kanye nakunhlokodolobha yasefrance , eparis , ukuzivocavoca ngaphandle kunemikhawulo yamahora athile ebangeni elithile ukusuka ekhaya lomuntu.

src_text: amagadango wokukhandela ubulwele afana newelizwe lekhethu ayasetjenziswa emazweni athileko.
tgt_text: izindlela zokugcina nokugwema ezifanayo nezethu zibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src_text: isibonelo, ukuthengiswa kotjwala ngesikhathi sokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi nama khambo kuphungulwe nofana kuvaliwe eendaweni ezithile ngokwemithetho yaborhulumende bemakhaya, lokhu kwenzeka emazweni anjengemexico, ihong kong negreenland, lezo ngenyanga ephelileko zimemezele ukwalelwa ukuthengiswa kotjwala ngesikhathi sokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo ngomnqopho wokunciphisa ukuthelelana ngobulwele ngahlanye ‘nokukhandela izehlakalo zenturhu eqothele abomma nabantwana.’kube khona ukuvezwa kwamazizo okukhulu emphakathini ngesiqunto sakarhulumende sokungezelela isikhathi sokwalela ukuthengiswa kwegwayi esigabeni sesine.
tgt_text: isibonelo, ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe kunemikhawulo ethile noma kumisiwe ezindaweni eziningi ngohulumeni bendawo, kubandakanya imexico , ihong kong kanye negreenland , ngenyanga edlule eyabeka ukuvalwa ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ukunciphisa ukusuleleka kodwa futhi ‘nokwehlisa udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.’sekube nemibono eminingi yomphakathi ngesinqumo sikahulumeni sokwelula ukuvinjelwa kokudayiswa kwemikhiqizo yogwayi esigabeni sesine.

src_text: isiqunto esifana nalesi kungenzeka silethe indabapikiswano, kodwana akusikuhle ukudlumbana bona kunabongqongqotjhe nofana umengameli abenza nabakhuluma umathanda kilendaba.
tgt_text: isinqumo esifana nalesi kulindelekile ukuthi silethe impikiswano, kodwa akukuhle ukucabanga ukuthi kunongqongqoshe noma umongameli owenza noma osho noma yini afuna ukuyisho ngalolu daba.

src_text: mhlana ama23 kusihlabantangana, ngamemezela bonyana kuzokuvunyelwa ukuthengiswa kwegwayi esigabeni sesine sokuqintentiswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo.
tgt_text: mhla zingama23 kumbasa, ngamemezela ukuthi ukudayiswa kogwayi kuzovumeleka esigabeni sesine.

src_text: lokhu bekususelwa embonweni womkhandlu olawula ingogwana yecorona welizweloke (inccc), ebegade kumumethwe mtlamo olitlhatlha ebegade usazokufaka amazizo womphakathi ngaphambi kokuphasiswa.
tgt_text: lokhu kwakususelwa embonweni womkhandlu kazwelonke obhekene negciwane lecorona (nccc), futhi okwakuqukethwe ohlakeni olwalungakaphasiswa olwaluchicilelelwe ukubonisana.

src_text: ngemva kokucabangisisa nokukhulumisana, inccc ibuyekeze umbono wayo ngegwayi.
tgt_text: emva kokucabangisisa okunzulu nokuxoxisana, inccc yabuye yabuyekeza isinqumo sayo egwayini.

src_text: ngebangelo, imithetholawulo ephasiswe yikhabinethi begodu yamenyezelwa ngungqongqotjhe unkosazana dlaminizuma mhlana ama29 kusihlabantangana lapha kwavela khona bona seluliwe isikhathi sokwalelwa kwegwayi.
tgt_text: yingakho ke, imithethonqubo eyavunyelwa yikhabhinethi neyamenyezelwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlaminizuma mhla zingama29 kumbasa yelula ukuvalwa kogwayi.

src_text: lesi kwaba siqunto esihlanganyelweko begodu neentatimende ezakhutjhelwa emphakathini ngimi nongqongqotjhe zenziwa egameni lomkhandlu, zagunyanzwa ngokuhlanganyela ngaphasi koburholi bami.
tgt_text: lesi kwaba yisinqumo esathathwa ndawonye nezitatimende ezethulwa emphakathini yimina nongqongqoshe zethulwa simele, sigunyazwe, yithimba engiliholayo.

src_text: yoke imithetholawulo esiyimemezeleko itjhejisisiwe.
tgt_text: wonke umthethonqubo esiwubekile ucatshangisiswe kanzulu.

src_text: kube khona nokukhulumisana nabosolwazi bezamaphilo, imikhakha namabubulo ahlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi senza lokho kube khona ukubonisana nongoti bezokwelapha, izifunda ezehlukene kanye nezimboni ezehlukene.

src_text: sihlahlwe ziinhlangano zeentjhabatjhaba nalokho esele kwenzeke kamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: besiholwa izinhlangano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nalokho amanye amazwe asedlule kukhona.

src_text: iqiniso kukobana silinga amanzi ngedondolo ebujamenobu.
tgt_text: iqiniso ukuthi sizwa amanzi ngobhoko.

src_text: kusese kunengi khulu okumayelana nengogwana le esingakwaziko.
tgt_text: kusekuningi kakhulu okumayelana nalolu bhubhane lwegciwane okungaziwa.

src_text: kungcono ukuba ngehlangothini eliphephileko kunokujamelana nomphumela omumbi oyihlekelele yesikhathi esizako ngenca yeenqunto ezingakafaneli esazithathako.
tgt_text: kungcono ukuphambukela ohlangothini lokucophelela kunokuthi kusasa silahlekelwe ngokwahlulelwa.

src_text: nanyana kunemibono engafaniko ngezinye iinqunto esizithetheko – godu kezinye iinkhathi lokhu kubangele ukuhlukana ngemibono – urhulumende usebenza ngamandla ngendlela yokwenza ngcono amalungelo wepilo nesithunzi sabantu boke.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi kusenokwehluka kwemibono kwezinye zezinqumo esizithathile – kwesinye isikhathi lokhu kunombono owehlukanisa abantu – uhulumeni wenza yonke imizamo ukukwenza ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi sabobonke abantu bakithi.

src_text: ukulalela abantu bekhethu neminako yabo ngesikhathesi kube ngelinye lamatshwayo aveleleko kobana thina njengorhulumende sikghone bunjani ukulawula umbulalazwe lo.
tgt_text: ekulaleleni abantu bakithi nokukhathazeka kwabo ngalesi sikhathi kube ngeye yezinto ezehlukile esinazo zokuthi uhulumeni ululawule kanjani lolu bhubhane.

src_text: siyaraga nokulalela iminako yabantu bekhethu begodu sizimisele ukuhlalisa kuhle iindawana ezilungisa iintjhijilo abaqalene nazo ngesidingo sokuhlenga amaphilo.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka ukulalela ukukhathazeka kwabantu bakithi futhi sizimisele ukwenza izinguquko ezizohambisana nokukhathazeka kwabantu ngezingqinamba abahlangabezana nazo nesidingo sokuphephisa izimpilo.

src_text: esikhathini lesi esibudisi, ihlanganyela yamandla wethu kufuze itjheje ekuqinisekiseni kobana amaphilo nepilo kuyahle ngwa, bonyana ukulethwa kokudla, amanzi, isizo lezamaphilo, iidingo zomphakathi zezehlalakuhle neembonelelo zezehlalakuhle akuphazanyiswa.
tgt_text: kulesi sikhathi esinzima, amandla ethu sonke kumele siwabhekise ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ezempilo nempilo kuyagcinwa, ukuthi ukuthuthwa kokudla, amanzi, usizo lwezempilo, ukuphepha komphakathi nokwesekwa komphakathi akuphazamiseki.

src_text: ngaphasi kobujamobu obungakajayeleki, njengorhulumende, njengabantu nanjengomphakathi kuzokwenzeka ngezinye iinkhathi senze iimphoso.
tgt_text: ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezingajwayelekile, njengohulumeni, njengomunye nomunye nanjengomphakathi ngesinye isikhathi amaphutha sizowenza.

src_text: lokha lokhu nakwenzekako, sizozilungisa.
tgt_text: uma lokho kwenzeka, sizowalungisa.

src_text: kodwana kufuze siragele phambili, singalahlekelwa sibindi nokuzimisela kwethu.
tgt_text: kodwa kumele siqhubekele phambili, singangenwa itwetwe noma singalahlekelwa ukuzimisela.

src_text: ubujamo esizifumana siqalene nabo bufuna isibindi nokubekezela.
tgt_text: isimo esizithola sikuso sidinga isibindi nokubekezela.

src_text: bufunaumnqopho omuhle nokuthembana hlangana kwenu, nizizakhamuzi norhulumende wenu nahlangana kwenu.
tgt_text: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba wonke awuphelile amandla ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , eselibhebhethe kise okomlilo wequbula.

src_text: intando yenengi yelizwe lekhethu izokusiza ukwehlula icovid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed sivame ukuthatha lula intando yenengi yelizwe lekhethu enepilo nesimemeko.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu izosisiza ukunqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sihlale siyithatha kancane intando yeningi yethu enempilo nenamandla.

src_text: kanti ngiyo eligugu lethu elikhulu emzabalazweni wethu wokwehlula umbulalazwe oyingogwana icorona.
tgt_text: kodwa ibe kuyiyona nto esinayo kulo mzuzu esikuwo wokuzabalazela ukunqoba ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: sinezakhamuzi ezikhamba phambili ephasini ngokulima indima kezombusazwe ephasiniloke.
tgt_text: sinezakhamuzi ezizib andakanyayo kwipolitiki emhlabeni.

src_text: ihlolomazizo yomnyaka wee2018 eyenziwa yipew research center ikhombisa bonyana amasewula afrika ayame khulu ehlangothini lokuthatha igadango lezombusazwe ngeendaba ezibatshwenya khulu, njengezamaphilo, zefundo, ilungelo lokuveza amazizo nekohlakalo.
tgt_text: inhlolovo yangowe2018 eyenziwa ipew research center ibonisa ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika bazimisele ukuthatha isinyathelo sezepolitiki ngezindaba ezibaphethe kabi kakhulu, njengosizo lwezempilo, ezemfundo, ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka kanye nenkohlakalo.

src_text: ihlolomazizo le iqinisekisa okunengi esele sikwazi ngathi.
tgt_text: inhlolovo iqinisekisa okuningi esesivele sikwazi ngathi.

src_text: akukho esikuthabela khulu kunekulumopendulwano eqinileko ngamezwi norhulumende wethu nahlangana nathi ngeenhloko ezingundabamlonyeni.
tgt_text: akukho okusithokozisa njengokuzibandakanya nohulumeni wethu naphakathi kwethu ezindabeni ezisematheni zosuku.

src_text: sinomphakathi okhutheleko onokuzibandakanya nohlala ulungele ukuvikela itjhaphuluko yethu namalungelo.
tgt_text: sinomphakathi ophapheme ohlezi ume ngomumo ukuvikela inkululeko namalungelo ethu ayisisekelo.

src_text: enye yepumelelo yentando yenengi yethu kukobana woke umsewula afrika ukholwa bonyana umthethosisekelo uyabavikela namakhotho aqunta ngokulungileko begodu ahlulela ngokungathathi ihlangothi begodu abeke phambili okutlhogwa ngibo.
tgt_text: okunye kokunqoba kwentando yeningi yethu ukuthi wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika uyakholwa ngukuthi umthethosisekelo uyabavikela nokuthi izinkantolo zinobulungiswa futhi zingumahluleli ongathathi icala obhekelele okudingwa yibona.

src_text: khengacabanga ngamaphuzu la evakatjhweni lami lamhlaphanje lepumalanga kapa nangiyokuhlola ubujamo besifunda bokulungela ukuqalana nengogwana icorona.
tgt_text: ngicabange ngalezi zindaba ngesikhathi ngivakashele empumalanga kapa maduze nje ukuyohlola ukuzilungiselela kwesifundazwe ukubhekana negciwane lecorona.

src_text: khengabuzwa ngusoondaba kobana ingabe ngitshwenyekile ngombango owethulwe ekhotho ophikisana neenqalelelo ezithile zomthetho wokuphathwa kwehlekelele.
tgt_text: ngabuzwa intatheli ukuthi ngabe ngikhathazekile yini ngombango wamacala okhona okuphosa inselele ekuhlinzekweni komthetho wokulawula kwenhlekelele.

src_text: umthetho lo usisekelo sayo yoke imithetholawulo ephasiswe ngokomthetho ngaphasi kobujamo behlekelele yelizweloke esayimemezelako ukukhandela ukubhebhedlha kwengogwana icorona.
tgt_text: lo mthetho uyisisekelo sayo yonke imithethonqubo eyamenyezelwa ngaphansi kwesimo senhlekelele sikazwelonke eyethulwa ukulwa negciwane lecorona.

src_text: solo kuthome isikhathi esibudisesi, inengi labantu lisebenzise ilungelo lalo lokuya emakhotho bafuna ukulalelwa.
tgt_text: selokhu kwaqala lolu sizi, abantu abaningi basebenzise ilungelo labo lokuya ezinkantolo.

src_text: imithetholawulo yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo yaphoswa ngeselele ngeveke yokuthoma yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo, iselele le iphoswa sisakhamuzi esizijameleko sempumalanga egade sifuna ukungabanjwa mithetholawulo ekhandela amakhambo ngombana yena afuna ukuya emngcwabeni.
tgt_text: imithethonqubo yokuvalwa kwezwe yaphoselwa inselele ngeviki lokuqala ngqa lokuvalwa kwezwe yisakhamuzi sasempumalanga esasifuna ukukhululwa ekunqatshelweni ukuhamba ukuze sikwazi ukuhamba siye emngcwabeni.

src_text: eemvekeni ezilikhomba ezalandelako, kube neenselele zezomthetho ezenziwe linengi labantu, iinhlangano zezekolo, iinhlangano zepolitiki, amango kunye neenhlangano zamabhizinisi, baphikisana negadango linye nofana athile wemibandela yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo egade bangakathabi ngayo.
tgt_text: emavikini ayisikhombisa alandela, sekube nezinselele zomthetho ezibuya kubantu abaningi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, amaqembu epolitiki, amangos nasezinhlanganweni zamabhizinisi ezilwisa isinyathelo noma eziningi zokuhlinzekwa kokuvalwa kwezwe abebengathokozile ngazo.

src_text: abanye baphumelele eembaweni zabo zomthetho kanti abanye abakaphumeleli.
tgt_text: abanye baphumelele kulezi zinselelo zabo abanye abaphumelelanga.

src_text: abanye baya emakhotho ngonobangela wokurhaba kweenlilo zabo kodwana abonobangela babo abarhabakwabo baphayelwa ngeqadi kanti abanye sele bafumene ezinye iindlela zokulalelwa kilokho egade bakufuna.
tgt_text: abanye baye ezinkantolo ngokubhekela ukuphuthuma kodaba lwabo lapho abathole impikiswano yabo ephuthumayo isichithwa enkantolo futhi abanye bathola ezinye izindlela zokukhululeka abebekufuna.

src_text: abanye bagcine bazilisa iimbawo zabo ngemva kwemikhulumiswano norhulumende.
tgt_text: abanye bazihoxise ngokulandelana izicelo zabo kulandela ukubonisana nohulumeni.

src_text: nalokha besingathanda ukubalekela isidingo samagadango wezomthetho athathelwa urhulumende, kumele samukele bonyana izakhamuzi ezingakathabi ngananyana ngiliphi igadango eliquntwe ngurhulumende ukuliphumelelisa zinelungelo lokuya emakhotho welizwe lekhethu ukuyokukhombela bona kubuyekezwe isiqunto bebafike kesibathabisako.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi singancamela ukugwema isidingo sokuthathela uhulumeni izinyathelo zomthetho, kumele samukele ukuthi izakhamuzi ezingathokozile nanoma yikuphi uhulumeni anqume ukukuqalisa zinelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ukuthola nanoma yikuphi ukukhululeka ezikufunayo.

src_text: lo, kumgomo ojayelekileko wentando yenengi enzinze kumthethosisekelo begodu nesenzo esamukeleka kuhle elizweni elisekelwe ekubuseni komthetho.
tgt_text: lona ngumgomo ojwayelekile wentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo futhi kuyisenzo esamukelekile ezweni elinesisekelo sokubuswa ngomthetho.

src_text: sineenlinganiso esihlolisisa ngazo ukuqinisekisa bonyana yoke imikhakha yokuphatha kukarhulumende ingaphumelela nayihlolwa ngelihlo lomthethosisekelo.
tgt_text: sibeke ngomumo izinqubo ezizogwema amaphutha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni ziyakwazi ukumelana nokuhlolisiswa ngokomthethosisekelo.

src_text: lapho sifunyanwa sibogaboga khona, kuzokufanela siziphendulele emakhotho wethu, begodu ngaphezu kwakho koke, siziphendulele kuzakhamuzi zelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: lapho sitholakala khona sifuna, siyobekwa icala izinkantolo zethu futhi, ngaphezu kwakho konke, yizakhamuzi zakithi.

src_text: ngaphandle kwamakhotho wethu, iinhlangano zethu ezisekela intando yenengi zesigaba se9 zikhona ukuphumelelisa amalungelo wezakhamuzi, njengalokha kwenza iinhlangano ezinikelwe umsebenzi wokutjhejisisa amaejensi wezokusetjenziswa komthetho.
tgt_text: ngaphandle kwezinkantolo zethu, umvikeli womphakathi kanye nekhomishana eyengamele amalungelo omphakathi waseningizimu afrika bakhona ukubeka phambili amalungelo ezakhamuzi, kanjalo nezinhlangano ezijutshwe ngokubhekelela amaejensi ezomthetho.

src_text: njengalokha khengatjela usoondaba, umsewula afrika ngamunye unelungelo lokuya ekhotho begodu nami, ngingumengameli nje, angeze ngajama endleleni kananyana ngubani osebenzisa ilungelwelo.
tgt_text: njengoba ngatshela intatheli, wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika unelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ngisho nami, njengomongameli, angeke ngama endleleni yanoba ubani osebenzisa lelo lungelo.

src_text: khekwaba begodu kuzakuraga nokuba nokusolwa okuqinileko okuvela emikhakheni ethileko malungana nendlela esilwa ngayo nengogwana icorona, ukuthoma ekutlanyweni komfuziselo wemininingwana nebonelophambili, ukufikela emiphumeleni yomnotho ngenca yokuqinteliswa kweminye imisebenzi namakhambo, nokufikela kumithetholawulo.
tgt_text: sekube, futhi kuzoqhubeka kube khona, ukugxekwa okunamandla nokushayisana ngezindlela eziningi zikazwelonke zokubhekana negciwane lecorona, kusuka ekucubunguleni imininingo nokulinganisela, kuya kwimiphumela yomnotho ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe, kuya kwimithethonqubo.

src_text: singurhulumende asifuni bona ukusolwa lokhu kuphekelelwe madlharuma wokulwa azakuvanga ilizwe nanyana kuthuliswe.
tgt_text: njengohulumeni asifuni ukuthi lokhu kugxeka kube nentukuthelo noma kuthuliswe.

src_text: ngakelinye ihlangothi, ukusola, nayikuthi kungokwakhako, kuyasisiza ukulungisa sibe majadu ekuziphenduleleni ukutjhugulula ubujamo nemibandela.
tgt_text: ngakoluhle uhlangothi, ukugxeka, ngokwakhayo, kusiza thina ukuthi sivumelane futhi siqhubeke masinyane futhi kalula ekubhekaneni nokushintsha izimeko nezimo.

src_text: kuhlumisa ikulumopendulwano etjhatjhalazi begodu kusinikele thina soke ukuzwisisa okungeneleleko eendabeni ezidenjwako.
tgt_text: kucebisa inkulumompikiswano yomphakathi futhi kusinikeza ukuqonda okusabalele ngezindaba okukhulunywa ngazo.

src_text: solo sijamile kelokuthi sithembele phezu kwemininingwana yezesayensi, yezomnotho nobufakazi berhubhululo nakuza ekuthatheni iinqunto nekutlameni imithetholawulo endabeni yengogwana icorona.
tgt_text: ngokungashintshi silokhu sithembele kulwazi lwezesayensi, lwezomnotho kanye nolwazi esiluthole ngokubona okwenzekayo uma kumele sithathe izinqumo nokusungula imithethonqubo ukuze sibhekane negciwane lecorona.

src_text: ukufikela ezingeni eliphezulu ekungafikelelwa kilo ngaphasi kobujamobu obubudisi, sinqophe ukukhulumisana nokuvumelana.
tgt_text: okukhulu kakhulu esingakwenza ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezinzima, sihlose ukubonisana nokuxoxisana.

src_text: sifuna woke amasewula afrika abe yingcenye yomzamo lo welizweloke.
tgt_text: sifuna bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika babe yingxenye yalo mzamo kazwelonke.

src_text: imibono yabantu boke kumele irage godu ilalelwe ngaso soke isikhathi esibudisi njengalesi.
tgt_text: imibono yezakhamuzi zakithi kumele iqhubeke ilalelwe ngesikhathi esinzima njengalesi.

src_text: umbulalazwe oyingogwana icorona namagadango esiwathetheko ukuyikhandela alethe ubudisi obukhulu ebantwini bekhethu.
tgt_text: ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona kanye nezinyathelo esizithathile ukulwa nalo sekulethe umthwalo kubantu bakithi.

src_text: ibangele ukuphazamiseka okukhulu nokubudisi.
tgt_text: sekudale ukuphazamiseka okukhulu nobunzima.

src_text: nanyana singakhomba iragelophambili esiyenzileko ekuriyadiseni ukurhatjheka kwengogwana le, kusese kunengi okumele kwenziwe.
tgt_text: yize singayikhomba inqubekelaphambili esesiyenzile ekubambezeleni ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane, iseyinde indlela esisazoyihamba.

src_text: iimveke neenyanga ezizako zizokuba budisi khulu begodu zizokufuna ukuzinikela okunengi khulu ebantwini bekhethu.
tgt_text: amaviki nezinyanga ezizayo zizoba nzima futhi zizofuna okukhulu ebantwini bakithi.

src_text: umbulalazwe lo uzokuraga nokuba mthwalo obudisi emphakathini wethu nemazikweni wethu.
tgt_text: ubhubhane luzoqhubeka lubeke ubunzima obukhulu emphakathini wakithi nasezikhungweni zethu.

src_text: ije sivula kabuthaka ukusebenza komnotho, umthelela ebujameni bepilo yabantu uzokukhambelela.
tgt_text: noma sivula kancane kancane umnotho, umthelela ezimweni zezinto zabantu uzoba mkhulu.

src_text: nalokha ubujamo busese nje, ikghonakalo yerarano, ukutjhayisana nokunganeliseki kuzakuhlala kukhona.
tgt_text: uma kuzobe kusasenjalo, amathuba okungqubuzana, ukungezwani nokungagculiseki kuzohlale kukhona.

src_text: njengombana sisebujameni obubudisi nobuqokemekobu, umthethosisekelo umhlahlandlela wethu oqakatheke khulu nevikeleko lethu eliligugu kithi.
tgt_text: njengoba sisesizibeni esimanzonzo, umthethosisekelo wethu yiwona nkombandlela yethu ebalulekile futhi neyigugu lethu lokuzivikela.

src_text: intando yenengi yethu eqinileko inikela amandla nokubekezela esikutlhogako ukwehlula esikutlhogako ukwehlula umraro ongeneleleko lo.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu enamandla ihlinzeka amandla kanye nokuqina esikudingayo ukunqoba lolu sizi olungaka.

src_text: njengoba urhulumende azwisisa bonyana inengi labenziimbawo ekhotho bakhuthazwa yihlalakuhle yabo boke, yeke nathi kumele sihloniphe bonyana iinqunto ezithathwa ngurhulumende zenziwa ngommoya omuhle begodu zinqophe ukuragela phambili, ingasi ukulimaza iindingo zamasewula afrika.
tgt_text: njengoba uhulumeni ekubonga ukuthi izicelo eziningi zenkantolo zigqugquzelwa okuhle okufanayo, ngakhoke nathi kumele sibone ukuthi izinqumo ezithathwa nguhulumeni zenziwa ngesihle futhi zenzelwe ukwenza ngcono, hhayi ukulimaza, izidingo zabantu baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: ekuliqaloqangi lethu kunakho koke kuhlenga amaphilo.
tgt_text: okuseqhulwini kunakho konke kusalokhu kungukusindisa izimpilo.

src_text: zoke iinqunto zethu zisekelwa sidingo sokwenza ngcono amalungelo wepilo nesithunzi njengalokha kutlolwe kumthethosisekelo wethu.
tgt_text: zonke izinqumo zethu ziholwa isidingo sokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi njengoba kubekiwe kumthethosisekelo wethu.

src_text: sizokuraga nokwamukela imibono ehlukahlukeneko – ngitjho nephikisako – mayelana nendlela yelizweloke yokulwisana nengongwana icorona.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka samukele imibono eyehlukile ngisho nephikisayo mayelana ngendlela kazwelonke esibhekana ngayo negciwane lecorona.

src_text: yoke imibono ilisizo begodu iyasisiza ukusebenza ngcono nangobuhlakani.
tgt_text: yonke imibono ilusizo futhi iyasisiza ukusebenza kangcono nangobuchule.

src_text: ukusetjenziswa kwamalungelo asisekelo wokuveza amazizo, ukuhlanganyela nokukhuluma kusilinganiso sepilo ehle yentando yenengi yethu.
tgt_text: ukusetshenziswa kwesisekelo senkululeko yokudlulisa lokhu ofisa ukukusho, ukuzibandakanya kanye nokukhuluma kuyisilinganiso sempilo enhle yentando yeningi yethu.

src_text: kodwana ngaphezu kwalokho, amalungelo la aqakathekile epumelelweni yomzabalazo wethu welizweloke nokubambisana ukwehlula ingogwana icorona.
tgt_text: intando yeningi yethu izosisiza ukunqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sihlale siyithatha kancane intando yeningi yethu enempilo nenamandla.

src_text: isewula afrika idlulelaesigabeni sesi3 vukuzenzele unnamed umengameli ucyril ramaphosa umemezele bona ise wula afrika seyidlulele esigabeni sesi3 ukusukela mhlana li1 kumgwengweni – nokuvulelwa kwemikhakha eminengi yezomnotho nokususwa kweminye yemiba ndela emayelana nokukha mbakhamba kwabantu.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika iya esigabeni sokuqapha sesithathu vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uye wamemezela enku lumweni yakhe ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika seyedlulele esigabeni sesithathu ma nje nokuqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangulana nemikhakha eminingi eyehlukene ivulile ukusebenza nokuxegiswa kwemikhawulo yokuhamba kwabantu.

src_text: nagade akhuluma nesitjhaba mva nje malungana namatjhuguluko enzekako ngesewula afrika ngamano wobungoziakhwezelelweko wokulawula ukurhatjheka kwecovid19, umengameli uthe inarha le izothatha indlela ehlukileko yokuqalana neendawo ezinezi nga eliphezulu lokuthelelana nokurhatjheka kwengongwana.
tgt_text: echaza enkulumweni yakhe yakamuva mayelana nenqu bekelaphambili emaswini ange nabungozi ahleliwe okubhe kana nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19), umongameli uthe izwe selizoba nendlela ehlukile yokubhekana ngqo nalezo zindawo ezinamazinga aphezulu okwesuleleka kanye nokusabalala kwalolu bhu bhane.

src_text: iindawo ezidlangelwe yicovid19 iindawo lezi zikhonjwe njengezidlangelwe bulwele bengongwana icorona.
tgt_text: izindawo eziyizizinda zecovid19lezi zindawo zimenyezelwe njengezizinda zegciwane lecorona.

src_text: zifaka phakathi amadorobha amakhulu la alandelako: itshwane ijohannesburg ekurhuleni ethekwini inelson mandela bay ibuffalo city nekapaezinye zeendawo ezikhonjwe njengezirhagalelwe khulu yingongwana ngezingaphasi kwabomasipala beeyingi ekuyiwest coast, overberg necape winelands, etjingalanga kapa, isiyingi sechris hani epumalanga kapa nesiyingi selembe kwazulunatala.
tgt_text: lezi zindawo zibandakanya la madolobha: etshwane egoli ekurhuleni ethekwini enelson mandela bay ebuffalo city ekapa.

src_text: indawo erhagalelwe bulwele ihlathululwa njengendawo enabantu abangehla kwabahlanu abangenwe bulwele ebantwini abaziinkulungwana ezilikhulu (100 000) namkha lapho ukuthelelwa okutjha kukhula ngendlela erhabako.
tgt_text: ezinye zezindawo ezikhonjwe njengezizinda kusewest coast, eoverberg kanye nasecape winelands nekusifunda somasipala wasesifundazweni sasentshonalanga kapa, isifunda ichris hani esi ngaphansi kwempumalanga kapa, kanye nesifunda ilembe esingaphansi kwesifundazwe sakwazulunatali.

src_text: ukulwisana nengongwana le eendawenezi, urhulumende uzothatha amagadango angeneleleko anqophe ukwehlisa inani lokuthelelwa okutjha.
tgt_text: indawo eyisizinda ichazwa njengendawo enabantu abathelelekile abangaphezulu kwabahlanu kubantu abayizi100 000 noma kube yileyo ndawo enezinga lokusuleleka okusha okukhuphuka ngesi vinini esikhulu.

src_text: "sizobeka amagadango aqinileko wokuhlola, ukulawula ukuthelelwa nokuphatha.
tgt_text: ukuze sikwazi ukulwa naleli gciwane kulezi zindawo, uhulumeni uzoqalisa ukungenelela ngamandla nahlose ngakho ukwehlisa isibalo esisha sabantu abesulelekayo.

src_text: sizobeka isiqhema sasafuthi sabasebenzi abanelwazi endaweni ngayinye," utjho njalo umengameli.
tgt_text: "sizothatha izinyathelo ezithe thuthu zokubhekisisa lezi zindawo ezinobungozi, ukulawula ukusuleleka kanye nokulandelelwa kwakho.

src_text: isiqhemesi sizokufaka phakathi abodorhodera abafunde ngokurhatjheka nokulawulwa kobulwele, abasebenzi bezokwelapha imindeni, abahlengikazi, abasebenzi bezamaphilo bomphakathi, abosolwazi bezamaphilo womphakathi nabasebenzi bemisebenzi yobobujamo oburhabekileko bezamaphilo, basekelwa bosolwazi bezamaphilo becuba.
tgt_text: sizothumela iqembu lochwephe she kuleso naleso sizinda," kusho umongameli.

src_text: "sizothintanisa amadzaba namaziko wokuhlolwa, iindawo zezakhiwo zokuzivalela uwedwa, iindawo zokwelatjhwa uwedwa, ukwelatjhwa, imibhede yesibhedlela nokwenza ilandelela yalabo ababe nokukuthintana nesigulani.
tgt_text: le liqembu lizobandakanya odokotela bokwelashwa kwezifo, odokotela bezo kwelashwa komndeni, abahle ngikazi, onompilo, ongoti bezokuphathwa kwezimpilo zomphakathi kanye nabophiko lokwelashwa okuphuthumayo, elizosekwa ngongoti basecuba.

src_text: "nakunesidingo, enye nenye ingcenye yelizwe ingabuyiselwa esigabeni sesi4 namkha sesi5 nangabe ukurhatjheka kokuthelelwa akulawuleki nangemva kwengenelelo lethu begou kunobungozi bokubhudungelwa bulwele ezakhiweni zethu zezamaphilo."
tgt_text: "sizoxhumanisa isizinda segciwane ngasinye nezinsizakalo zokuhlolela leli gciwane, izindawo zokuhlala wedwana, izindawo zokugonqa zalabo asebehaqekile, ukwelashwa, imibhede yasesibhedlela kanye nokuthungatha labo abake bahlangana nalowo ogulayo.

src_text: utjho njalo.
tgt_text: "uma ngabe kunesidingo kungenzeka ukuthi, noma yiyiphi ingxenye yezwe ibuyele esigabeni sokuqapha sesine noma sesihlanu uma ngabe ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane kungathibeki ngisho sekunge nelelwa futhi kunobungozi bokukhungatheka kwezi khungo zethu zezempilo," kusho yena.

src_text: irhelo leendawo ezirhagalelwe bulwele lizobuyekezwa qobe ngemva kweemveke ezimbili nakhona kuyokuya ngokuragelaphambili kokurhagela kwengongwana.
tgt_text: uhlu lwezindawo eziyizizi nda zegciwane luzobuyekezwa njalo emva kwamaviki amabili ngokuzoya ngokubhebhetheka kwegciwane.

src_text: ukuvula umnothoukuthoma kokusebenziswa kwesigaba sesi3, esithome nakuthoma inyanga kamgwengweni, kufaka phakathi nokubuyiselwa kokusebenza kwemikhakha eminengi yezomnotho, kwaphela lokho kuyokwenzeka ngaphasi kwelihlo elibukhali lokulandela imilayo yezamaphilo eqinileko nemithetho yokuqalangana.
tgt_text: ukuvulwa komnothoukuqaliswa ngokusemthe thweni kwesigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, nesiqale ekuqaleni kukanhlangulana, kufake phakathi ukubuyiselwa kokusebenza ngokujwayelekile kwemikhakha emini ngi yomnotho, ngokulandela imithetho eqinile yezempilo nokuziqhelelanisa nabantu.

src_text: abasebenzi abanengi bombuso nabo sebabuyele emsebenzini ngokuya kwendinyana ezisemthethweni wezokuphepha namaphilo njengoba ulawulwa mnyango wezabasebenzi bombuso nokuphatha, ngokusebenzisana neminye iminyango karhulumende.
tgt_text: abasebenzi bakahulumeni a baningi babuyelile emsebenzini ngokuhambisana nemibande la ehambisana nokusebenza komthetho wezempilo kanye nokuphepha emsebenzini, nangokuholwa ngumnyango wezemisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nokuphathwa kwayo ngokusebenzisana neminye iminyango kahulumeni.

src_text: imithethokambiso ekufuze ilandelwe namano eendaweni zokusebenzanjengoba imikhakha eminengi yomnotho ivulwa, urhulumende uzothembela ekusebenzisaneni nekubambisaneni naboboke abadlala indima eqakatheke khulu ekulungiseni ubungozi obukhulu eendaweni zokusebenza begodu nekuthintaneni kwabasebenzi nomphakathi.
tgt_text: imithetho kanye nezinhlelo ezindaweni zokusebenzanjengoba imikhakha eminingi yomnotho ivula, uhulumeni uzothembe la kakhulu ezenzweni za bantu bomphakathi naba bambiqhaza ababalulekile ukubhekana nobungozi ezindaweni zokusebenza kanye nalapho abasebenzi behlangana nomphakathi.

src_text: "yekeke, sizoqedelela inani lemithethokambiso ekufuze ilandelwe yemikhakha begodu sizofuna bona enye nenye ikhampani ibeke amano wayo eendaweni zokusebenza ngaphambi kokuvula," utjho njalo.
tgt_text: "ngakhoke sizophothula imithetho eminingi yakulo mkhakha futhi sizodinga ukuba zonke izinkampani zakhe izinhlelo mayelana nokusebenza kwazo ngaphambi kokuvulwa," kusho yena.

src_text: ukuya ngokwamano la, iinkampani kuzofuneka zibe neendawo zeenhlanzekisi neenlinganiso zokuba maqalanga kunye nezakhiwo; ezizofuneka ukwenzela bona kuhlolwe abasebenzi nabafikako qobe ngelanga, babeke bodwa labo esebathelelweko begodu benze amalungiselelo bona bazohlolwa.
tgt_text: ngokwalezi zinhlelo, izinkampani kufanele zihlinzeke izibulalimagciwane kanye nokuziqhele lanisa nabantu; kumele zixilonge abasebenzi nsuku zonke uma befika, zigo nqise labo asebesulelekile ngaleli gciwane futhi zenze izinhlelo zokuba bahlolwe.

src_text: "kuzofuneka bona godu basize ngokwenza ilandelela yemininingwana yalabo abasebenzi abathintene nabo nabahlolwako batholwa banayo ingongwana.
tgt_text: "kumele ziphinde zisize ngokuthungatha labo asebehlangane nalowo osehaqwe yileli gciwane.

src_text: ngonobangela wobuthakathaka babo, boke abasebenzi abangehla kweminyaka ema60 ubudala nalabo ebatlhoriswa magulo anjengobulwele behliziyo, itjhukela, ukugula kwamaphaphu nekankere kufuze bahlale emakhaya," utjho njalo umengameli.
tgt_text: ngenxa yobuthakathaka babo, bonke abasebenzi abaneminyaka engaphezulu kwengama60 ubudala futhi abanezifo eziyimbelesela okunga ba isifo senhliziyo, isifo sikashukela, izifo eziphathelene nokuphefumula kanye nomdlavuza kumele bahlale ekhaya," kusho umongameli.

src_text: abasebenzi ebakghonako ukusebenzela emakhaya kufuze bavunyelwe bona benze njalo.
tgt_text: abasebenzi abakwaziyo ukusebenzela emakhaya kumele bavunyelwe ukwenza kanjalo.

src_text: ngonobangela wamagadango la, woke amabubulo womkhiqhizo, imayini, amagontraka, iinkampani ezisebenza ngemali, imisebenzi zobucwephetjhe neyamabhizinisi, ilwazi letheknoloji, zokuthintana, imisebenzi karhulumende neyeembikiindaba, izovulwa godu ukusukela mhlana li1 kumgwengweni.
tgt_text: ukulandela lezi zinyathe lo, zonke izimboni ezikhi qizayo, izimayini, abakhi, abezezimali, imisebenzi ekhokhelwayo namabhi zinisi, ubuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha, abe zokuxhumana, imisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nabezindaba, baqalile ukuse benza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangu lana.

src_text: ukuthoma kabutjha nokusetjenziswa ngeendlela ezifaneleko kuzofuneka kulungiselelwe kizozoke iindawo zokusebenza.
tgt_text: amalungiselelo okuqala kahle ukusebenza ngokwezigaba kanye nokufakwa kwezinhlelo kuzokwenziwa kuzo zonke izindawo zokusebenzela.

src_text: "iintolo ezikulu namasuphamakethe zizokuvulwa ngokupheleleko, ekufaka phakathi iintolo, iimphaza, nabathengisi abangakazitlolisi.
tgt_text: "abathengisi kanye nohwebo lwezitolo kuzovulwa ngokuphelele nakho, okubandakanya izitolo, iziphaza kanye nabathengisi basemgwaqeni.

src_text: ukuthengisa ngokwetheknoloji kuzokuragela phambili ngokuhlala kuvuliwe.
tgt_text: ukuthenga ngeinthanethi kuzoqhubeka kusebenze.

src_text: eminye imikhakha eyavulwa esikhathithi esidlulileko, njengezokulima namahlathi, nabaphakeli ngeembaseli, imisebenzi yezamaphilo, abakhiqhizi bokudla nabenzi bomkhiqhizo wokuhlanzekisa, izokuhlala ivuliwe," utjho njalo.
tgt_text: eminye imikhakha eyayi vele seyivuliwe, njengezoli mo kanye nezamahlathi, izinsiza ezibalulekile, usizo lokwelapha, ukukhiqizwa kokudla kanye nokukhiqizwa kwemikhiqizo ye nhlanzeko, izoqhubeka nayo isebenze," kusho yena.

src_text: iindawo zomnotho ezinobungozi angeze zavulwaiindawo zomnotho ezinobungozi zizokuhlala zivaliwe.
tgt_text: imisebenzi yomnotho enobungozi obuphezulu ayivumelekileimisebenzi enobungozi obuphezulu izoqhubeka nokungavumeleki.

src_text: ezifaka phakathi: iindawo ezithengisa ukudla, utjwala neendawo zokusela utjhwala, ngaphandle kweendawo zokusabalalisa nokuyokuthatha ukudla.
tgt_text: le mi sebenzi ibandakanya: izindawo zokuhlala phansi udle, izindawo ezithengisa nezokuphuzela utshwala, ngapha ndle uma kuhanjiswa noma kulandwe ukudla.

src_text: iindawo zokuhlala namakhambo wangekhaya weemphaphamtjhini, ngaphandle kwamakhambo wamabhizinisi, wona azokungeniswa ngeengaba emalangeni asazokwaziswa.
tgt_text: izindawo zokuhlala kanye nezindawo zokuhamba ngezindiza zalapha ekhaya, ngaphandle uma uhamba ngomsebenzi, okuzo vunyelwa ngezinsuku ezisazomenyezelwa ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: iindawo zemihlangano emikhulu, iminyanya, nokuzithabisa kunye nezenzo zemidlalo.
tgt_text: izingqungquthela, imi cimbi, ukuzijabulisa kanye nemidlalo.

src_text: imisebenzi yokutjheja abantu, ekufaka phakathi ukwenza iinhluthu nokuziphotjhonga.
tgt_text: ukuzicwala, okubandakanya ukulungiswa kwezinwele kanye nemisebenzi nokuziphaqu la.

src_text: ukukhamba kwabantu nokuthengiswa kotjwalaabantu bazokwazi ukuzithabulula ngesinye nesinye isikhathi emini, kwaphela lokhu nangabe abakwenzi ngeenqhema.
tgt_text: ukuhamba kwabantu kanye nokuthengiswa kotshwalaabantu bazovunyelwa ukuba bakwazi ukuzivocavoca noma nini ngezikhathi zasemini, kuye ngokuthi lokho abakwenzi ngamaqembu.

src_text: umlayo oyalela ukuhlala kwabantu emakhaya nesikhathi esiqintelweko samakhambo wabo kuzokupheliswa.
tgt_text: umthetho we washi ovimbela ukuhamba kwabantu uzosuswa.

src_text: "utjwala bungathengiselwa ukuselelwa ngekhaya ngaphasi kwemibandela eqinileko, ngamalanga athileko nangamaawara abekiweko.
tgt_text: "utshwala bungathengi swa ukuphuzelwa ekhaya ngaphansi kwemigomo eqinileyo, ngezinsuku ezithile futhi ngamahora athile.

src_text: iimemezelo malungana nalokhu zizokwaziswa nasele siqedile ngemikhulumiswano nomkhakha lo mayelana nemibandela ehlukahlukeneko," utjho njalo umengameli.
tgt_text: izimemezelo ezihambisana nalokhu zizo kwethulwa uma sekupho thulwe izingxoxo kuleyo mikhakha eyahlukene," kusho umongameli.

src_text: ukuthengiswa kwegwayi kuzohlala kuvaliwe esigabeni sesi3, ngonobangela wobungozi bezamaphilo obukhambisana nokubhema.
tgt_text: ukuthengiswa kuka gwayi kuzoqhubeka nokungavunyelwa kulesi sigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, ngenxa yobu ngozi bempilo yabantu obuhambisana nokubhema.

src_text: "koke ukuhlangenyela kuzokuhlala kuvaliwe, ngaphandle kwemingcwabo enganabantu abangehla kabama50 namkha imihlangano yendaweni zemsebenzini emayelana nomsebenzi," utjho njalo.
tgt_text: "yonke imibuthano yomphakathi ayivunyelwe, ngaphandle kwemingcwabo enabantu abangadluli kuma50 noma imihlangano ezindaweni zokusebenza ngezinhloso zemisebenzi," kusho yena.

src_text: lindelani ukukhuphuka kokuthelelwaumengameli uramaphosa uthi, njengendlela yokulungiselela ukukhuphuka okulindelweko kokuthelelana ngecovid19 enarheni, imibhede yembhedlela elinganiselwa eenkulungwaneni ezima20 (20 000) seyilungiselelwe ubujamobo obuzakulethwa yicovid19, begodu iimbhedlela zesikhatjhana ezima27 sele zakhiwe elizweni loke.
tgt_text: ukulindela ukwe nyuka kwesibalo so kwesuleleka nge gciwaneumongameli uramapho sa uthi, ukulungiselela u kwenyuka kwesiba lo sabantu abaphe thwe igciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezweni, kunemibhede yasezi bhedlela eyizi20 000, futhi, ihlelelwe izigameko zeco vid19, kanye nezibhedlela zesikhashana ezingama27 esezakhiwe ezweni jikelele.

src_text: "inengi leembhedlela lezi sezikulungele ukwamukela iingulani ezinengongwana icorona."
tgt_text: "ezinye zalezi zibhedlela seziqalile ukwamukela iziguli ezinegciwane lecorona."

src_text: umengameli uthi uthokoza umsebenzi oragela phambili ukwenziwa basebenzi bombuso, khulu khulu labo ebadosa phambili ekulwisaneni necovid19.
tgt_text: umongameli uthi uhulumeni uyawubonga umsebenzi wezisebenzi zikahulumeni, ikakhulukazi labo abaphambili empini yokulwa nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19).

src_text: "ukuphepha kwabasebenzi boke, ekufaka phakathi abasebenzi bombuso, kumnako omkhulu kithi.
tgt_text: "ukuphepha kwabo bonke abasebenzi, kubandakanya izisebenzi zikahulumeni, kuyingxe nye yokukhathazeka kwethu sonke.

src_text: sizokuragela phambili nokwenza imizamo yokuqinisekisa kokulethwa kweentlabagelo zokuvikela abantu ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwawo woke umuntu emsebenzini.
tgt_text: sizoqhubeka nokwenza imizamo ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza zokuzivikela ezanele ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha kwawo wonke umuntu ngesikhathi esemsebenzini .

src_text: "amaqaloqangi wethu kukwehlisa amathuba wokurhatjheka kwengongwana nokwakha ubujamo obuphephileko babantu boke," utjho njalo.
tgt_text: "esikubeke eqhulwini uku qala ukwehlisa amathuba okusabalala kwegciwane lecorona kanye nokwenza indawo ephephile yawo wo nke umuntu," kusho yena.

src_text: iiyeleliso ekufuze zilandelwe ukubalekela ukuthelelwa ngengongwana icorona .
tgt_text: amasu okumele uwalandele ukuze ugweme ukwesuleleka ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: »hlala ekhaya ngendlela ongakghona ngayo.
tgt_text: »hlala ekhaya ngayo yonke indlela.

src_text: »ukhumbule ukuba maqalanga.
tgt_text: »khumbula ukuziqhelelanisa nabantu »gqoka isifonyo sakho sobuso »hlanzisisa izandla zakho ngensipho.

src_text: »umbathe imaski yakho yobuso.
tgt_text: geza izandla zakho macala onke, phakathi neminwe kanye naphansi kwezinzipho.

src_text: »uhlambisise izandla zakho ngesibha.
tgt_text: hlanza izandla zakho njalo ngensipho ngaphambi kokudla nasemva kokuba nabantu.

src_text: uhlambe izandla zakho ngemva, hlangana nemino nangaphasi kweenzipho.
tgt_text: »vala umlomo wakho ngethishu uma ukhwehlela futhi uthimula.

src_text: ngasosoke isikhathi hlamba izandla zakho ngesibha ngaphambi kokuthi udle nangemva kokuba hlangana nabantu.
tgt_text: gwema ukuzithintathinta ubuso ngezandla ezingcolile ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src_text: »vala umlomo wakho ngethitjhu nawukhohlelako nanoma uthimulako.
tgt_text: »thola ukwelashwa uma ungaphilanga kahle.

src_text: ubalekele ukuthinta ubuso bakho ngezandla ezingakahlanzeki ngasosoke isikhathi.
tgt_text: izimpawu ezijwayelekile zecovid 19 emzimbeni zibandakanya ukukhwehlela, ikhala eligxazayo, imfiva kanye nokuvaleka ukuphefumula.

src_text: »funa isizo lezamaphilo nawungazizwa kuhle.
tgt_text: uma ngabe uhlaselwa ngezinye zalezi zimpawu, thola usizo lokwelashwa ngokuphazima kweso.

src_text: amatshwayo ajayelekileko wecovid19 emzimbeni afaka phakathi ukukhohlela, ipumulo ethonta amathimila, umgomani nokuphefumula ngasuthi ugandelelekile.
tgt_text: ngeminye imininingwane ethe thuthu shayela isikhungo sezifo ezithelelanayo kuzwelonke kule nombolo esebenza ubusuku nemini ethi: 0800 029 999 noma ungene ku: www.

src_text: nangabe uhlangabezana namanye wamatshwayo la, funa isizo lezamaphilo msinyazana.

tgt_text: iningizimu afrika iya esigabeni sokuqapha sesithathu vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uye wamemezela enku lumweni yakhe ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika seyedlulele esigabeni sesithathu ma nje nokuqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangulana nemikhakha eminingi eyehlukene ivulile ukusebenza nokuxegiswa kwemikhawulo yokuhamba kwabantu.

src_text: ilutjha lesewula afrika limthombo wekuthalo nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amagama kafrantz fanon athi ‘isizukulwani ngasinye kumele sifumane ihloso yaso ngepilo’ afika emkhumbulwenami ngaso soke isikhathi nakumele ngikhulume nelutjha lesewula afrika.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika ingumthombo wogqozi nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amazwi kafrantz fanon athi 'isizukulwane ngasinye kumele sithole impokophelo yaso' ayangifikela njalo uma nginethuba lokukhuluma nabantu baseningizimu afrika abasebasha.

src_text: akunandaba bonyana bahlala kuphi nofana khuyini abayenzako, omunye nomunye utjhiswa yitjisakalo yokutjhugulula iphasi.
tgt_text: noma ngabe bahlala kuphi futhi noma ngabe benzani, bonke ngamunye banentshisekelo yokushintsha umhlaba.

src_text: ngesikhathi bancamele ukuthuthukisa amaphilwabo, ngahlanye bafuna ukufikelela ubujamo bomphakathi ongcono nephasi elingcono.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi befuna ngokungangabazeki ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabo, bafuna futhi ukuba nomphakathi ongcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

src_text: bazibona babasebenzeli bamatjhuguluko asisekelo.
tgt_text: bazibona bengamanxusa enguquko eyisisekelo.

src_text: emlandweni welizwe lekhethu kuvela bona ilutjha belisolo libatjhotjhozeli bamatjhuguluko.
tgt_text: emlandweni abantu abasha bebelokhu behola ukuletha uguquko.

src_text: ematjhumini weminyaka adluleko abantu abatjha badose phambili imizabalazo balwisana nokudinywa kobulungiswa, ukusukela emtjhagalweni wabafundi beparis ngomnyaka we1968, ukuya egadangweni lehlangano eyayilwisana nepi yephasi eunited states ngeminyaka ye1960, ukuﬁ kela emzabalazweni owawulwisana negandelelo yokumukwa inarha emazweni amanengi weafrika neweasia, ukuﬁ kela epini eyalwisana nebandlululo, kufakwa hlangana imiguruguru yamhlapha yokulwisana negandelelo lombuso nobujamo obungasibuhle bepilo emazweni wamaarabhu, iarab spring.
tgt_text: emashumini eminyaka embalwa edlulile, abantu abasha sebelwe izimpi eziningi zomzabalazo belwela ukungabikho kobulungiswa, kusuka ngowe1968 kumbhikisho wabafundi eparis, kuya kumkhankaso ophikisana nempi emelika ngowe1960, kuya kumzabalazo ophikisana nobuqonela emazweni amaningi aseafrika naseasia, kuya ekulweni nobandlululo, kuya kumibhikisho yokulwela inkululeko yamaarab iarab spring.

src_text: mhlaphanje, ilutjha gade lidosa phambili ijima le#blacklivesmatter (ipilo yabanzima iqakathekile) esele lizuze isekelo lephasiloke mayelana nesenzo samhlapha sokubulawa kukageorge floyd lipholisa leunited states.
tgt_text: kungekudala nje, abantu abasha bebephambili kumkhankaso we #blacklivesmatter ozuze ukwesekwa umhlaba jikelele emva kokubulawa kukageorge floyd emelika.

src_text: eemvekeni ezidlulileko, abatjhotjhozeli gade balwela bona kususwe ngekani iinthombematshwayo ezibuka ikambiso yelunya yokurhwebelana ngamakhoboka neyegandelelo lokwemukwa inarha.
tgt_text: emavikini ambalwa adlule, izishoshovu emhlabeni jikelele bezilokhu zifuna kususwe imifanekiso etusa ubulwane nodlame lokuhweba ngezigqila kanye nobuqonela.

src_text: emtjhagalweni wamhlapha eoxford university, umtjhagali bekaphethe ibhorodo enamagama athi ‘umfanekiso karhodes awugirizwe (rhodes must fall’), okwakusimemezelosililo sabafundi belizwe lekhethu eminyakeni emihlanu eyadlulako.
tgt_text: embhikishweni wasenyuvesi yaseoxford muva nje umbhikishi wayephethe uqwembe olunamagama athi 'rhodes must fall", ukukhala okuhlangene kwabafundi ezweni lethu eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule.

src_text: ilutjha lephasini mazombe lifumene into yinye nefanako elingayilwela.
tgt_text: abantu abasha emhlabeni jikelele bathole isisusa esisodwa.

src_text: bagiriza iinthombe namatshwayo amumethe ukunina ngokobutjhaba, bafuna kupheliswe ihlelo lefundo enegandelelo, nokwenza isimemezelo sokobana amaziko wezefundo aqalane nomraro wokukhethulula ngokobutjhaba nokungabandakanywa kwesitjhaba soke ngokupheleleko.
tgt_text: babhidliza izithombe ezibaziwe nemifanekiso ecwasa ngokobuhlanga, bafuna kukhululwe ezemfundo, futhi bafuna zonke izikhungo zibhekane nokucwaswa ngokobuhlanga nangokwenhlalo.

src_text: ngalokhoke, sithatha umzuzu lo sihloniphe isizukulwani sangomnyaka we1976, namhlanje nakali16 kumgwengweni wee2020, sethulela ingwani ilutjha lesewula afrika elilama isikhathi sebandlululo, abaninilifa abafanelwe kuzuza kileligugu eliqakathekileko nesizikhakhazisa ngalo.
tgt_text: manje, njengoba sihlonipha isizukulwane sangowe1976 mhla ziyi16 nhlangulana 2020, sithulela isigqoko intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangasemva kobandlululo, izindlalifa ezifanelwe yileli lifa elihle kangaka.

src_text: umsebenzi welutjha lomnyaka we1976 kwakukuphelisa ihlelo lefundo yabantu abanzima (ibantu education); kobana ilutjha lanamhlanjesi liragele phambili nephrojekthi yokubuyisana neyokuletha amatjhuguluko welizweloke.
tgt_text: umsebenzi wesizukulwane sangowe1976 kwakungukushabalalisa imfundo yobandlululo; okumele intsha yanamuhla iqhubele phambili umsebenzi wokubuyisana nokwenza izinguquko ezweni.

src_text: esikhathini esiminyaka ezako kuzakuthiwa ngalomnyaka wee2020, kwaba kuthoma kwesikhathi somlando omutjha wabantu.
tgt_text: esikhathini esizayo kuzothiwa lo nyaka, wezi2020, kwakungukuqala kwesikhathi esisha emlandweni wabantu.

src_text: akhange kwaphela ingogwana yecorona ibe nomthelela omumbi emaphilweni wabantu kodwana nengeniso yabo yakhinyabezeka, yabuye yakhahlameza nendlela ebegade kwenziwa ngayo izinto ephasini loke.
tgt_text: igciwane lecorona aligcinanga nje ngokuthinta kanzima izimpilo zabantu kanye nokuphila, liphinde lanyakazisa ukuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: indlela umbulalazwe lo obambe iphasi ngobhongwana ngakho, kube sikhumbuzo sokobana ekugcineni soke sibabantu abaphila ngokubambisana nokungalingani okungeneleleko okuphakathi kwamazwe nokungaphakathi kwelizwe lethu.
tgt_text: indlela ubhubhane olube yiyona lusikhumbuze ukuxhumana kwezinhlanga zabantu kanye nokungalingani okujulile okukhona phakathi kwamazwe naphakathi emazweni.

src_text: umbulalazwe lo unikela ngethuba lokulungisa kabutjha ikambiso lapho umuntu ngamunye aziwa ngokwezinga lokunotha kwakhe, azicabangela bekazitjheje yena yedwa kodwana lokhu akuthinti abantu ngamunye kwaphela kodwana kufaka hlangana amazwe jikele.
tgt_text: lolu bhubhane lusinika ithuba 'lokulungisa kabusha' umhlaba esiwubona ngobulima bokuqhakambisa izinto ngokweqile, ubugovu kanye nokuzithiba hhayi nje kwicala lomuntu ngamunye kodwa emiphakathini yonke.

src_text: abantu abatjha basitjela bonyana ifundiso eqakathekileko, izwelo nobunye kufuze kube matshwayo anzinzileko womphakathi omutjha osazokuba khona, nokobana bazimisele ukuba badosiphambili bephaseli elitjha, elingcono.
tgt_text: abantu abasha basitshela ukuthi amagugu abalulekile obuqotho, isihawu kanye nobumbano kumele kube izimpawu zomphumela womphakathi omusha, nokuthi bazimisele ukuba ngamaqhawe alo mhlaba omusha, ongcono.

src_text: emikhulumiswaneni engikhe ngaba nayo nelutjha ngithe asikafaneli ukuqalela phasi amandla womkhumbulo, ngombana imikhumbulo ingatjhugulula kanti seyikhe yatjhugulua iphasi.
tgt_text: ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nabantu abasha ngithe akumele sibukele phansi amandla ombono, ngoba imibono ingashintsha futhi isishintshe umhlaba.

src_text: imikhumbulo ikhuthaze iragelophambili labantu begodu ingilokho okuzakusiphumelelisa ukutlama indlela etja ngesikhathi esilama sengogwana yecorona.
tgt_text: imibono isikhuthaze inqubekelaphambili yabantu futhi iyona ezokwenza sikwazi ukuphendla indlela entsha esikhathini sangemva kwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: abantu abatjha laba batjhugulule imikhumbulwabo yaba zizenzo.
tgt_text: laba bantu abasha baguqule imibono yabo yaba izenzo.

src_text: akhange bavumele ukutlhayelelwa ziintlabagelo kube siqabo.
tgt_text: abavumelanga ukuntuleka kwezinsiza kubaphazamise.

src_text: bazakhele igama ngokwabo emikhakheni ethileko ukusukela kezethekhnoloji ethuthukileko ukufikela ekunzinzeni kwebhoduluko.
tgt_text: bazitholele intuba emikhakheni eminingi kusuka ebuchwephesheni obuphezulu kuya ekugcinweni kwemvelo.

src_text: njenganje sizokutjheja ummoya wamano nobudosiphambili belutjha lekhethu ukuletha ipengu abazokuzuza ngayo, imiphakathi yabo nesitjhaba kilehlekelele yokutlhayela kwemisebenzi.
tgt_text: manje ukudlula ekuqaleni sizobheka umfutho wentshayakithi wokusungula nokuqamba izinto ukuza nezisombululo zosizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi ezizosiza bona, nemiphakathi yabo.

src_text: ngokufanako, ngiphosa ilutjha lelizwe lekhethu ngeselele yokutlama nokugwala amahlelo azosisiza ukuﬁ kelela iminqopho yethu yetuthuko.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi esifanayo, ngiphosela inselele intsha yezwe lakithi ukusungula nokuqamba izinhlelo ezizosisiza ukufezekisa amaphupho ethu okuthuthuka.

src_text: ngomnyaka we1961, ilizwe lecuba elalidoswa phambili mavulandlela wetjhuguluko lathumela iinqhema zamavolontiya wabafundi eentabeni nezabelweni ukuyokwakha iinkolo, ukufundisa ukutlola nokufunda nokubandula abafundisi abatjha.
tgt_text: ngowe1961, icuba eguqukileyo yathumela ibutho labafundi abangamavolontiya abasebasha ezintabeni nasezigodini ukuyokwakha izikole, bafundise ukufunda nokubhala nokuqeqesha othisha abasha.

src_text: ijimeli lisathathwa njengelaba yipumelelo ekulu emlandweni wanamhlanje.
tgt_text: namanje usathathwa njengomkhankaso oyimpumelelo kakhulu kunayo yonke emlandweni wesimanje.

src_text: abantu abatjha bekhethu bamele batlame amano wokuzithuthukisa kunye nehlalakuhle yabo begodu badose phambili.
tgt_text: abantu bakithi abasha kumele basungule imizamo yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi futhi kumele kube yibona abayiholayo.

src_text: njengalokha badosa phambili umzabalazo wokuphelisa ukungalingani kwefundo ephakemeko, amandla abonakalako welutjha lekhethu kumele abonakale ekulweleni ukufikelelwa okulinganako kezamaphilo, ukutjhugululwa kobunikazi benarha, begodu ngaphezulu kwalokho okuqakatheke khulu bulungiswa obulawula imilandu ekhambisana nobulili.
tgt_text: njengoba benza emzabalazweni wokulwela ukulingana emfundweni ephakeme, umfutho omkhulu wentsha yakithi kumele usetshenziswe ukulwela ukufinyelela okulinganayo ekunakekelweni ngokwezempilo, ekuguquleni nakubunikazi bomhlaba futhi, okubaluleke kakhulu, ubulungiswa ngokobulili.

src_text: njengawo woke amasewula afrika, ngitshwenyeke khulu ngokudlanga kokubulawa kwabomma abasesebatjha, babulawa madoda.
tgt_text: njengabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika, ngiphazamiseke kakhulu ukwenyuka kwezinga lokubulawa kwabesifazane abasebancane bebulawa ngamadoda.

src_text: lezi kuzizenzo zokutlhoga ubuntu ezithusako nezinganandawo emiphakathini yethu.
tgt_text: lezi izenzo ezithusayo zobulwane ezingenandawo emphakathini wakithi.

src_text: ukutjhotjhozela okudoswa phambili lilutjha, ukuyelelisa nokwelulekwa ngokomkhumbulo bontanga kumathulusi aqakathekileko emizameni yethu yokuruthula inturhu eqothele ubulili emiphakathini yekhethu.
tgt_text: ubushoshovu obuholwa yintsha, ukuqwashisa kanye nokwelulekana kwentsha yizona zikhali zethu emizamweni yethu yokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile emphakathini.

src_text: ngokufanako, kumele siqinise ihlelo lethu lezobulungiswa, siqinisekise bonyana abaphehli benturhu le bayabotjhwa, imibandela yebheyili nokulitjalelwa iqiniswe nokobana labo abanikelwe isigwebo sedilikajele bahlale amaphilwabo woke bavalelwe.
tgt_text: ngaso lesi sikhathi, kumele siqinise uhlelo lwethu lobulungiswa, siqinisekise ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyajeziswa, kuqiniswe imithetho yebheyili noshwele nokuthi labo asebegwetshwe udilikajele babhadla ejele impilo yabo yonke.

src_text: njengombana lokhu kutlhoga ukuzibandakanya komphakathi okungeneleleko, ngenza isimemezelo ebantwini bembaji abasesebatjha bona balwisane nenturhu eqothele ubulili.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi lokhu kudingaumsebenzi womphakathi wonke, ngicela amadoda ikakhulukazi asemancane ukuqala umzabalazo wokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src_text: ngaphandle kobana siphelise ukutlhoriswa kwabomma besewula afrika, ibhudango lethu lomphakathi omutjha alizukuﬁ kelelwa.
tgt_text: uma singaqeda impi ebhekiswe kwabesifazane baseningizimu afrika, iphupho lomphakathi omusha lizolokhu liyize leze.

src_text: abanye bethu abebayingcenye yeenhlangano zabafundi ngesikhathi sombuso webandlululo sihlala sibuzwa bonyana silibona njani ilutjha lanamhlanje.
tgt_text: labo bethu ababeyingxenye yombhikisho wabafundi ngesikhathi sobandlululo sihlezi sibuzwa ukuthi sicabangani ngentsha yanamuhla.

src_text: kunokulingeka ngokubuyela esikhathini esadlulako ngomkhumbulo malungana ‘namalanga wedumo’ lepolotiki yabafundi nomzabalazo welutjha, engeze kusabuyelelwa.
tgt_text: kunokulingeka okukhona kokuﬁ sa ukubuyela emuva 'ezinsukwini ezimnandi' zepolitiki yabafundi nomzabalazo wentsha, okungeke kuphinde kube khona.

src_text: kodwana njengelutjha leminyaka yangaphambilini elahlathulula ihloso yalo yepilo, nelutjha lanamhlanjesi lenze njalo.
tgt_text: kodwa ngendlela intsha yangonyaka odlule echaze ngayo umsebenzi wayo, intsha yanamuhla iwuchazile owayo.

src_text: ilutjha lesewula afrika lomnyaka wee2020 liyahlangabezana nezinga eliphezulu elakhiwa banduleli babo.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangowezi2020 iyaﬁ ka ebangeni eliphezulu elabekwa abangaphambili.

src_text: linokuzithemba, liyabekezela begodu linesibindi, kanengi lizifumana liqalene nobujamo obubudisi.
tgt_text: banethemba, bayabekezela futhi banesibindi, ikakhulukazi uma bebhekene nesimo esinzima kakhulu.

src_text: ilutjha limthombo wekuthalo nethemba.
tgt_text: bangumthombo wogqozi nethemba.

src_text: ngezenzo zabo, bakha iphasi elinobulungiswa, elilinganako, elinzinzileko nelinokuthula.
tgt_text: intsha yaseningizimu afrika ingumthombo wogqozi nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amazwi kafrantz fanon athi 'isizukulwane ngasinye kumele sithole impokophelo yaso' ayangifikela njalo uma nginethuba lokukhuluma nabantu baseningizimu afrika abasebasha.

src_text: umma onehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko wehlule ingogwana yecovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uyelelisa amasewula afrika, khulukhulu lawo anehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko bona bakhathalele ubujamo bepilwabo.
tgt_text: umama onesifo esiyimbelesela unqobe icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulukazi labo abanezifo eziyimbelesela bazibophezele empilweni yabo.

src_text: abantu abanehlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko – njengobulwelebesifuba sommoya, umfutho weengazi ophakemeko, ubulwele beziso obungelaphekiko nebetjhukela – bangaba nengogwana icorona engeneleleko (icovid19), godu bangahlongakala ngonobangela wegandeleleko elenziwa yingogwana emzimbenabo.
tgt_text: abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela – njengesifuba somoya, umfutho wegazi ophakeme, izifo eziyimbelesela ezihambisana nezinso kanye nesifo sikashukela – bangahlangabezana nezimpawu zegciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezibucayi kakhulu, futhi bangafa nokufa ngenxa yengcindezi elethwa yileli gciwane emzimbeni yabo.

src_text: ngetjhudu, lokha umelaphi wekapa nongumma wabantwana abathathu uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka ema40) afunyanwa anengongwana icovid19 godu anobulwele besifuba sommoya (iasthma), wakghona ukulawula ihlanganisela yamalwele angelaphekiko la begodu akhange agule khulu.
tgt_text: ngenhlanhla enkulu, ngesikhathi udokotela osebenza ekapa futhi ongumama wabantwana abathathu uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka engama40) uye wahlonzwa njengonegciwane lecorona (icovid19) kwelinye icala eguliswa yisifuba somoya, nokwazile ukulawula lezi zimo futhi ngaphandle kokugula okutheni.

src_text: umohammed wafumana ingogwana icovid19 kusobentwabakhe, osebenza elabhorathri yesibhedlela igroote schuur.
tgt_text: umohammed usuleleke ngecovid19 eyithola kumkhwenyana wakhe, osebenza elebhu yesibhedlela igroote schuur.

src_text: indodana kamohammed eneminyaka elikhomba nayo yafunyanwa inengogwana.
tgt_text: indodana kamohammed eneminyaka eyisikhombisa ubudala nayo ihlonzwe njengenegciwane.

src_text: ngemva kokufunyanwa banengogwana, bobathathu bazivalela ngekhaya.
tgt_text: emva kokuhlonzwa njengezisulu zegciwane lecorona, bobathathu babe sebehlala ngabodwana khona ekhaya labo.

src_text: "sazivalela ngekamureni yethu, lokha unosokanami – onobulwele betjhukela nomfutho weengazi ophakemeko ngetjhudu ongakhange atheleleke ngengongwana – begade atjheja abentabethu ababili," kwatjho umohammed.
